data.quote: If you don’t follow your heart, you might spend the rest of your life wishing you had.
data.author: Brigitte Nicole

data.quote: I just wish people would realise that anything is possible if you try.
data.author: Terry Fox

data.quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
data.author: John Shedd

data.quote: Would you believe in what you believe in if you were the only one who believed it?
data.author: Kanye West

data.quote: There is a greater gift than the trust of others, and that is to trust in one’s self.
data.author: Jenny, Call the Midwife

data.quote: It is easier to build up a child than it is to repair an adult…
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Vulnerability sounds like truth and looks like courage.
data.author: Brené Brown

data.quote: Have patience with all things but first of all with yourself.
data.author: Saint Francis de Sales

data.quote: Those who have a voice must speak for those who are voiceless.
data.author: Bishop Oscar Romero

data.quote: Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
data.author: Kristen Duke

data.quote: Be the light that helps others see.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: We create a meaningful life by what we accept as true and by what we create in the pursuit of truth, love, beauty, and adoration of nature.
data.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

data.quote: Solitude is the balm for the bruised soul.
data.author: Avijeet Das

data.quote: But I don’t want an easy life. I want a meaningful one.
data.author: Natasha Ngan

data.quote: Never stop believing that you are a seed that must be converted into a big tree.
data.author: Myra Yadav

data.quote: True wealth is the ability to underwrite a meaningful life.
data.author: Bryan Portnoy

data.quote: Luxury cannot cure poverty.
data.author: Nikki Verd

data.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
data.author: Stephen Chbosky
